title: don't miss this amazing home.
description: Welcome to this immaculate home located in Bradford Square, West Chester. No need to do ANYTHING, you can just move right into this beautiful one bedroom, one bath first floor home! When you enter this home you'll notice how well maintained and beautifully updated it is. The renovated kitchen features granite countertops, plenty of cabinet space, a large island and newer stainless steel appliances. There is neutral colored carpet and the home has been freshly painted. The wood-burning fireplace with a marble surround is great for those cold winter days! The updated bathroom features a tile floor and a large shower with glass doors and a vanity. The spacious bedroom has a large walk-in closet with plenty of storage. Looking to grill or enjoy a cup of coffee outside? Then check out the private patio off the great room. You'll find a utility and storage shed there too. This home also features a newer HVAC system (2018), a newer hot water heater (2018), and a newer washer and dryer. Bradford Square is located within walking distance of the borough of West Chester where you can enjoy all the town has to offer including great restaurants, shopping, and entertainment. The community includes tennis courts, pool, basketball court, playground and is close to parks and playgrounds. Low taxes, great location, don't miss this amazing home!

title: Modern Girard Estate 3 Bed 1.5 Bath Home w/ W/D, Yard, H/W Fls & more!
description:
Modern Girard Estate 3 Bed. 1.5 Bath Home w/ W/D, Yard, H/W fls and more! Cute place ! Come see! Nice foyer when you first walk in. Then walk in to a nice-sized living room/dining room combo with H/W floors, half bath, and wall unit AC. Modern eat-in kitchen with gas range and refrigerator. Great sized rear yard that is perfect for entertaining! The basement is full and unfinished with W/D. The second floor has 3 nice-sized bedrooms and a 3-piece ceramic tile bathroom. Great home! Good light and window space! Tenant to supply their own AC units. Radiator gas heat. Tenant pays gas, electric, cold water/sewer and cable/internet. We do require renters insurance. First, last and security required at lease signing. 1 year lease minimum. Potential tenants can apply online at www.forresterpropertymgmt.com - $75 non refundable application fee with two paystubs/some income verification and photo ID. We run a credit, criminal and eviction check. For gross monthly income, we look for 3x the rent. If approved, you will be charged a document preparation fee of $100.00. THIS FEE IS NON-REFUNDABLE. Each resident over the age of 18 must submit a separate rental application. Small dogs below 25 lbs and cats OK with a one time non-refundable pet fee. Available Jan 2023! Contact Mike Giordano for more info at  show contact info
!

title: CENTER CITY PHILADELPHIA APT NEAR RITTENHOUSE SQ BE A PART OF HISTORY
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. title: Quaint three-story home in Queen Village!
description:
Quaint three story home in Queen Village! Modern kitchen with granite countertops, light cabinets, all stainless steel appliances and ceramic tile floor opening to rear courtyard. Open floor plan with gleaming hardwood floors throughout the home. Architect designed amenities full of charm with modern details. Built in bookshelves in kitchen, stair wells, and bedrooms. Recessed lighting throughout. The second floor has its own suite with French doors opening to a bedroom with two closets, a large walk-in closet, and a full ceramic tiled bath with a linen closet. French doors open to a lovely new, secluded deck with built-in bench. The third floor main bedroom suite has a cathedral ceiling with exposed brick wall and decorative fireplace. There is a large walk-in closet and new spacious, well appointed full ceramic tile walk-in shower with recesses. Roof top efficient central air system. This house is immaculate and neutral. Walk Score 5/5. Enjoy the awesome lifestyle that Queen Village provides. Perfect blend of house and location! Available 1/1/2023

title: Charming 2 Bed, 2 Full Bath in One of the Most Desirable Neighborhood!
description:
Tucked away on a quiet, tree-lined street in the heart of Queen Village sits a historic and charming 2 bed, 2 full bath in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in the city. A tiled foyer greets you as you enter the open living and dining room with hardwood floors through out and plenty of light. The spacious and bright kitchen is a perfect mix of cottage sensibility and function with its reclaimed wood shelving, white subway tile and butcher block counter tops. Backdoor leads to a cozy patio ideal for grilling and potted plants. Make your way upstairs where you’ll find the first of two large bedrooms plus a second-floor den with enough space to accommodate an additional entertainment room or perhaps a WFH office. A full bath and large closet for linens and additional storage round out this floor. The third floor features a primary suite with generous closet space, full 3-piece bath and a roof deck retreat for an evening with friends or quiet mornings with a cup of coffee. 516 Kauffman St is a commuter friendly home being close to public transportation and I95 and is steps away from neighborhood treasures like Shot Tower Coffee, Moon + Arrow, Bus Stop Boutique and Essene Market.

title: 3bed/1.5bath townhome boasts open concept in Philadelphia
description: Just in time for the holidays; Welcome Home to 3124 N Judson Street!  This 3bd/1.5ba home boasts open concept with modern appeal.   Enter into a living room made for entertaining or simply cozy up for an evening in on these cold winter nights.  From there, you're greeted by a dining area that spans into your dream kitchen with newer appliances making cooking a breeze.  Off of the kitchen, you'll find the 1st floor bedroom that's both spacious and secluded from the rest of the home.  And from the kitchen your own outdoor oasis awaits you.  Before you ascend to the 2nd floor, you'll also notice a powder room directly off the kitchen.  Just up the sleek staircase you'll find both the master bedroom and 2nd bedroom both designed to wow and containing ample closet space.  And at the top of the staircase is the show stopper bathroom that includes both a glass stall shower and an original clawfoot bathtub made for soaking the day away.  Throughout this spacious home you can appreciate luxury laminate vinyl flooring, warm and inviting neutral tones, and a huge basement providing laundry and additional storage.  And if this home couldn't get any better, it's convenient location makes getting in and around the city a breeze as you're directly near all major roadways (i.e US-1, i76, Kelly Drive, etc).  So what are you waiting for; schedule your tour today as this home won't last long! Provide your number so that we can contact you for more information.

title: Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge, Elevator building, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
